mapper.select: SELECT a.`id`, a.`cid`, a.`rid`, a.`created`, a.`next_time`, b.`name` cname, c.`name` rname, a.`content`, d.id resource_id, d.`url`resource_url, d.`name` resource_name, d.`priority` resource_priority, e.`device_id`, f.`name` device_name FROM inspect a LEFT JOIN company b ON a.`cid`=b.`id` LEFT JOIN company c ON a.`rid`=c.`id` LEFT JOIN resource d ON a.`id`=d.`owner` LEFT JOIN inspect_device e ON a.`id`=e.inspect_id LEFT JOIN device f ON e.`device_id`=f.`id` WHERE d.`type`=1 AND a.`id`=#{id}
